1 - comment
variable v; procedure p; stmt s; print pp; call c; assign a1, a2; while w1, w2; if i1, i2; read r;
Select <i1, w2, w1, i2> such that Parent*(i1, w2) and Parent*(w1, i2) and Next*(i1, i2)

5000
2 - comment
variable v; read r;
Select <r, v> such that Modifies(r, v)
2 a, 3 b, 23 c, 24 d, 25 e, 35 read, 50 print, 82 f, 101 n, 111 while, 126 k, 134 b, 142 o, 166 x, 170 e, 174 j, 186 j, 192 y
5000
3 - comment
procedure p1, p2, p3;
Select <p1, p2, p3> such that Calls*(p1, p2) and Calls(p1, p3) and Calls(p2, "F") and Calls(p3, "G")
A B F
5000
4 - comment
variable v; procedure p;
Select <p, v> such that Modifies("F", v) and Uses(p, v) and Calls(p, "G")
F b, F c, F d, F e, F f, F g, F h, F i, F j, F k, F m, F n, F o, F p, F q, F r, F s, F t, F x, F y, F z, C b, C c, C d, C e, C f, C g, C h, C i, C j, C k, C m, C n, C o, C p, C q, C r, C s, C t, C x, C y, C z
5000
5 - comment
variable v; procedure p; stmt s; print pp; call c; assign a1, a2; while w; if i; read r;
Select <a1, a2> such that Next*(a1, a2) and Parent*(a1, a2) pattern a2(_, _"a"_) 
none
5000
6 - comment

8 - optimization
